ISSUE.TITLE: Add support for now <file>
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: _From @rauchg on July 7, 2017 6:16_ Support for `now <file>`, with support for: - Binaries as a first-class deployment type - Static deployments as a fallback _Copied from original issue: zeit/now#2_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Revert "[now-node-bridge] Increase timeout to 10 minutes" (#768) This reverts commit 1658a84795b1dbd3ae240b2443476fdcf3af38f7.
